name: Hibearnation
description:
Welcome to Beartholomew's cabin. He is a very cozy bear that just wants to sit in his favorite chair by the fire. Unfortunately he needs to get up to hunt for food before his winter hibernation. Thankfully he has invented a state of the art fork-harpoon that will allow him to spear food from the comfort of his chair.

Will Beartholomew eat enough food before winter arrives?

Created by:

Andrew Miller

Austin Bennett

Immanuel Phillips

For the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022
